snippet: Staff Sgt. Alonzo M. Lunsford Jr., who was shot seven times by Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan during an attack at the Fort Hood Army base in 2009, will confront his attacker during his testimony.
abstract: Major Nidal Malik Hasan, Army psychiatrist charged in deaths of 13 people in 2009 shooting rampage at Fort Hood, Tex, is representing himself at his trial;  Staff Sgt Alonzo M Lunsford Jr, and other victims shot by Hasan, will face cross-examination from him when they testify; legal experts say it will be one of the most unpredictable and significant military trials in recent history.
lead_paragraph: Staff Sgt. Alonzo M. Lunsford Jr., who was shot seven times by Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan during an attack at the Fort Hood Army base in 2009, will confront his attacker during his testimony.

headline.main: Victims to Again Face Gunman in Fort Hood Trial
headline.print_headline: Victims to Again Face Gunman in Fort Hood Trial
